/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars and buses, painted in vibrant hues of red and blue, traverse the road, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape.

The sky above is a canvas of blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Power lines crisscross above the street, forming a web-like pattern against the sky. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to bathe the street in their warm glow as dusk falls.

In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, their majestic peaks adding a touch of nature's grandeur to the cityscape. The image is a blend of urban development and natural beauty, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing.
